cells.data:
-- deleteBy :: (a -> a -> Bool) -> a -> [a] -> [a]
on deleteBy(fnEq, x, xs)
    if length of xs > 0 then
        set mb to uncons(xs)
        if Nothing of mb then
            xs
        else
            set ht to Just of mb
            set {h, t} to {|1| of ht, |2| of ht}
            if |Î»|(x, h) of mReturn(fnEq) then
                t
            else
                {h} & deleteBy(fnEq, x, t)
            end if
        end if
    else
        {}
    end if
end deleteBy
